pages.text: Ebenaqua is a bobasatraniiform from the late Permian period. It had a triangular body shape similar to modern angelfish. Its fossils have been found in the Rangal Coal Measures.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
